bibl.title: A Michigan Musical Papyrus Revisited.
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Adapted from the second chapter of the author's PhD dissertation, ""The Practical Muse: Reconstructing the Contexts of a Greek Musical Papyrus"". - P. Mich. Inv. 2958 (= M.-P.3 2442; LDAB 4761). - Introduction. - Physical Description. - Musical Notation. - Unarticulated Text and Apparatus Criticus. - Articulated Text and Translation. - Commentary on the Semeia. - Commentary on Text. - Transcription into Western Notation. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Rebecca Ann Sears, A Michigan Musical Papyrus Revisited.
